A heavy burgundy curtain, similar to the fabric detail in Image 0, should hang motionless near the back wall, contributing to the oppressive dimness of the room, consistent with the atmosphere of Image 0. The overall visual texture of the stone walls and floor should be tactile and weathered, matching Image 1.
